question.text: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <semantics> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0"> <msub> <mi>log</mi> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mi>b</mi> </mrow> </msub> <mo>⁡<!-- ⁡ --></mo> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mn>1</mn> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mstyle> </mrow> </semantics> </math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <semantics> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0"> <msub> <mi>log</mi> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mi>b</mi> </mrow> </msub> <mo>⁡<!-- ⁡ --></mo> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>b</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mstyle> </mrow> </semantics> </math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <semantics> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0"> <msup> <mi>b</mi> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <msub> <mi>log</mi> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mi>b</mi> </mrow> </msub> <mo>⁡<!-- ⁡ --></mo> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> </msup> </mstyle> </mrow> </semantics> </math>
question.answer: x

question.text: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <semantics> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0"> <msub> <mi>log</mi> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mi>b</mi> </mrow> </msub> <mo>⁡<!-- ⁡ --></mo> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <msup> <mi>b</mi> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mi>x</mi> </mrow> </msup> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mstyle> </mrow> </semantics> </math>
question.answer: x

question.text: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <semantics> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0"> <msub> <mi>log</mi> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mi>b</mi> </mrow> </msub> <mo>⁡<!-- ⁡ --></mo> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mi>y</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mstyle> </mrow> </semantics> </math>
question.answer: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <semantics> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0"> <msub> <mi>log</mi> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mi>b</mi> </mrow> </msub> <mo>⁡<!-- ⁡ --></mo> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>+</mo> <msub> <mi>log</mi> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mi>b</mi> </mrow> </msub> <mo>⁡<!-- ⁡ --></mo> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>y</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mstyle> </mrow> </semantics> </math>

question.text: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <semantics> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0"> <msub> <mi>log</mi> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mi>b</mi> </mrow> </msub> <mo>⁡<!-- ⁡ --></mo> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mstyle displaystyle="false" scriptlevel="0"> <mfrac> <mi>x</mi> <mi>y</mi> </mfrac> </mstyle> </mrow> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mstyle> </mrow> </semantics> </math>
question.answer: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <semantics> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0"> <msub> <mi>log</mi> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mi>b</mi> </mrow> </msub> <mo>⁡<!-- ⁡ --></mo> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>−<!-- − --></mo> <msub> <mi>log</mi> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mi>b</mi> </mrow> </msub> <mo>⁡<!-- ⁡ --></mo> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>y</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mstyle> </mrow> </semantics> </math>

question.text: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <semantics> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0"> <msub> <mi>log</mi> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mi>b</mi> </mrow> </msub> <mo>⁡<!-- ⁡ --></mo> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mi>d</mi> </mrow> </msup> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mstyle> </mrow> </semantics> </math>
question.answer: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <semantics> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0"> <mi>d</mi> <msub> <mi>log</mi> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mi>b</mi> </mrow> </msub> <mo>⁡<!-- ⁡ --></mo> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mstyle> </mrow> </semantics> </math>

question.text: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <semantics> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0"> <msub> <mi>log</mi> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mi>b</mi> </mrow> </msub> <mo>⁡<!-- ⁡ --></mo> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mroot> <mi>x</mi> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mi>y</mi> </mrow> </mroot> </mrow> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mstyle> </mrow> </semantics> </math>
question.answer: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <semantics> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0"> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mfrac> <mrow> <msub> <mi>log</mi> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mi>b</mi> </mrow> </msub> <mo>⁡<!-- ⁡ --></mo> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <mi>y</mi> </mfrac> </mrow> </mstyle> </mrow> </semantics> </math>

question.text: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <semantics> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0"> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <msub> <mi>log</mi> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mi>b</mi> </mrow> </msub> <mo>⁡<!-- ⁡ --></mo> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>y</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> </msup> </mstyle> </mrow> </semantics> </math>
question.answer: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <semantics> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0"> <msup> <mi>y</mi> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <msub> <mi>log</mi> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mi>b</mi> </mrow> </msub> <mo>⁡<!-- ⁡ --></mo> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> </msup> </mstyle> </mrow> </semantics> </math>

question.text: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <semantics> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0"> <msub> <mi>log</mi> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mi>b</mi> </mrow> </msub> <mo>⁡<!-- ⁡ --></mo> <mi>a</mi> </mstyle> </mrow> </semantics> </math>
question.answer: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <semantics> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0"> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mfrac> <mrow> <msub> <mi>log</mi> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mi>d</mi> </mrow> </msub> <mo>⁡<!-- ⁡ --></mo> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>a</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <mrow> <msub> <mi>log</mi> <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"> <mi>d</mi> </mrow> </msub> <mo>⁡<!-- ⁡ --></mo> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>b</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> </mstyle> </mrow> </semantics> </math>

question.text: Harmonic Sum: H(n): <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"> <mtable displaystyle="true"> <mtr> <mtd> <mn>1</mn> <mo>+</mo> <mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mn>2</mn> </mfrac> <mo>+</mo> <mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mn>3</mn> </mfrac> <mo>+</mo> <mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mn>4</mn> </mfrac> <mo>+</mo> <mo>⋯</mo> <mo>+</mo> <mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mi>n</mi> </mfrac> </mtd> </mtr> </mtable> </math>
question.answer: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"> <mrow> <mi>ln</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>n</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow </math>

question.text: Triangular Sum: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"> <mtable displaystyle="true"> <mtr> <mtd> <mn>1</mn> <mo>+</mo> <mn>2</mn> <mo>+</mo> <mn>3</mn> <mo>+</mo> <mn>4</mn> <mo>+</mo> <mo>⋯</mo> <mo>+</mo> <mi>n</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mfrac> <mrow> <mo stretchy="false"></mo> <mi>n</mi> <mo>⁢</mo> <mrow> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mrow> <mi>n</mi> <mo>+</mo> <mn>1</mn> </mrow> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> </mrow> <mi>2</mi> </mfrac> </mtd> </mtr> </mtable> </math>
question.answer: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"> <mrow> <msup> <mi>n</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow </math>

question.text: Geometric Sum: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"> <mtable displaystyle="true"> <mtr> <mtd> <mn>1</mn> <mo>+</mo> <mn>2</mn> <mo>+</mo> <mn>4</mn> <mo>+</mo> <mn>8</mn> <mo>+</mo> <mo>⋯</mo> <mo>+</mo> <mi>n</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>2</mn> <mo>⁢</mo> <mi>n</mi> <mo>-</mo> <mn>1</mn> </mtd> </mtr> </mtable> </math>
question.answer: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"> <mrow> <mn>2</mn> <mo>⁢</mo> <mi>n</mi> </mrow </math>
question.note: These are pyramid numbers. Each square is a layer of the square-based pyramid.

question.text: Stirling's Approximation: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"> <mtable displaystyle="true"> <mtr> <mtd> <mi>lg</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>n!</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>=</mo> <mi>lg</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mn>1</mn> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>+</mo> <mi>lg</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mn>2</mn> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>+</mo> <mi>lg</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mn>3</mn> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>+</mo> <mi>lg</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mn>4</mn> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>+</mo> <mo>⋯<!-- ⋯ --></mo> <mo>+</mo> <mi>lg</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>n</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mtd> </mtr> </mtable> </math>
question.answer: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"> <mrow> <mi>n</mi> <mo>⁢</mo> <mi>lg</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>n</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow </math>

question.text: Associative
question.answer: Grouping can change. For instance, addition: (a + b) + c == a + (b + c).

question.text: Commutative
question.answer: Order can change. For instance, addition: a + b == b + a.

question.text: Distributive
question.answer: Operations can be applied to members of a group. For instance, multiplication over addition: a × (b + c) = a × b + a × c.

question.text: Transitive
question.answer: a related to b and b related to c implies a related to c. For instance, less than: If a < b and b < c, then a < c.

question.text: Reflexive
question.answer: Related to itself. For instance, equality: a == a.

question.text: Symmetric
question.answer: Related in both directions. For instance, equality: if a == b then b == a.

question.text: xy % d
question.note: Because modulo is distributive with multiplication.

question.text: (x + y) % d
question.note: Because modulo is distributive with addition.
